content.title: Contribute To Docs

Contribute to docs.content:
There are several ways to request your first AsyncAPI docs task:
Connect with a docs maintainer: Ask for a good-first-issue in the #13_docs channel of the AsyncAPI Slack workspace.
Update current docs: Surf the existing documentation, look for typos, grammar, errors, create an issue, and submit a Pull Request.
Propose new docs: If you have any ideas or suggestions for necessary documentation, create a new docs issue and propose yourself as the assignee.

content.full_text:
Contribute to docs
There are several ways to request your first AsyncAPI docs task:

Connect with a docs maintainer: Ask for a good-first-issue in the #13_docs channel of the AsyncAPI Slack workspace.
Update current docs: Surf the existing documentation, look for typos, grammar, errors, create an issue, and submit a Pull Request.
Propose new docs: If you have any ideas or suggestions for necessary documentation, create a new docs issue and propose yourself as the assignee.
